name: Black Spire
description:
game Features:

  • Horizontal combat adventure: Combining hand-painted and 3D effects, an adventure full of challenges and surprises.
  • Soul-like battle: There are many types of enemies, and each enemy has its own fighting style. You must be careful whether you are facing minions or bosses.
  • Unique operation experience: maybe it's a side-scrolling combat operation you haven't seen before -- throw away the annoying left stick, because you will move forward automatically! Take care of your battle space and fighting by rolling, attacking, blocking and a variety of skills.
  • Exploration: The black spire is full of traps and secret doors, and the adventurous spirit may allow you to win better rewards.
